The Trump administration withdrew protections Wednesday that gave transgender students the right to use bathrooms and locker rooms corresponding to their gender identity PERIOD

The Obamaera memo provided antidiscrimination civil rights for students and threatened public schools violating the guidance with a loss of federal funding PERIOD A joint letter from the departments of justice and education said that states and local governments should play the primary role in establishing education policy. makayla CichoszKing UM Allies student coordinator said she was struck with horror by the retraction PERIOD While the University has genderidentity protections written into code CichoszKing said the message being sent by the retraction was essentially legitimizing LGBTQ discrimination PERIOD

We have federal protections for every other minority group she said PERIOD Why should this be treated differently than civil rights protecting any other human being

After a gay couple was attacked in downtown Missoula earlier this month CichoszKing said the Trump administration is causing an influx of people needing protections while working to take those protections away PERIOD

According to a  national survey of transgender discrimination  percent of transgender students reported feeling unsafe in school PERIOD Adrianne Donald an adviser to UM Allies said members of the campus community will need to join together in support and make every student feel secure PERIOD

Even in our own state there is a LGBTQ antidiscrimination bill that is getting killed in committee Donald said PERIOD We need federal macrolevel protections in addition to a strong focus on student allyship. according to reports by the New York Times and Washington Post Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos initially denied Attorney General Jeff Sessions request for her to sign off on the retraction PERIOD After pressure from President Trump DeVos reportedly gave in despite her concerns of a possible increase in bullying PERIOD

During his presidential campaign Trump said a transgender person should use the bathroom they feel is appropriate even welcoming Caitlyn Jenner to use any bathroom she chose at Trump Tower PERIOD

Kimberly Lamar a former Associated Students of the University of Montana senator said she was surprised to hear of DeVos initial apprehension PERIOD However she said she was not surprised that people in the administration were bending under ideological pressure PERIOD

DeVos reversal just highlights that fact that people in these positions are swayed by power party and money Lamar said PERIOD Ive wondered whether Trump actually has a stance on this kind of thing or if he is just trying to please a conservative voterbase and going against everything Obama did. matthew.neumanumontana.edu
